meta.name: description
meta.content: New Branches Charter Academy is a tuition-free Preschool through 8th grade public school located in Grand Rapids, Michigan.

link.script: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@graph":[{"@type":"WebSite","@id":"https://newbranches.org/#website","url":"https://newbranches.org/","name":"New Branches Charter Academy","inLanguage":"en-US","description":"Deeply Rooted and Branching Out","potentialAction":[{"@type":"SearchAction","target":"https://newbranches.org/?s={search_term_string}","query-input":"required name=search_term_string"}]},{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://newbranches.org/#webpage","url":"https://newbranches.org/","name":"New Branches Charter Academy - Tuition-Free Public School","isPartOf":{"@id":"https://newbranches.org/#website"},"inLanguage":"en-US","datePublished":"2015-07-18T01:45:20+00:00","dateModified":"2020-04-27T18:10:27+00:00","description":"New Branches Charter Academy is a tuition-free Preschool through 8th grade public school located in Grand Rapids, Michigan.","potentialAction":[{"@type":"ReadAction","target":["https://newbranches.org/"]}]}]}

div.class: no-top-content-padding border-bottom wave-bg siteorigin-panels-stretch panel-row-style panel-row-style-for-8-2

div.div: New Branches Charter Academy, located in Grand Rapids, Michigan, is a tuition-free public school, serving children in Kindergarten through 8th Grade. Our mission is to provide a positive learning environment, along with a rigorous academic and cultural program where our children learn to become healthy, responsible citizens, life-long learners, and world leaders.

New Branches Charter Academy esta localizada en Grand Rapids, MI es una escuela publica gratuita sirviendo estudiantes del Kindergarden al 8vo. grado.
Nuestra mision es proveer un ambiente de aprendizaje positivo, junto con un programa academico riguroso y cultural en donde nuestros estudiantes aprendan a convertise en ciudadanos saludables, responsables, aprendices de por vida y lideres mundiales.

li.class: post-list-item format-standard post-4567 post type-post status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry category-blog

img.alt: Thank you PADNOS, for donating 50 laptops to our students

div.p: PADNOS, a local recycling company, just donated 50 Dell Venue laptops to New Branches! We are so grateful to for their donation. This will allow even more of our students to continue their learning online. “We are proud to be involved in the communities in which we conduct business. One of our Core Values is […]

li.class: post-list-item format-standard post-4506 post type-post status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry category-blog

div.p: Dear Students, Pogona misses all of you and hopes all is well with each of you. She would like to provide you with a helpful, fun tip for the day: Spend some time outside each day for fresh air and exercise!! It is a great time to look around for signs of Spring! (be sure […]
